description:
Welcome Devaun to her first Hogtied appearance. What
a debut it was! We subjected this first timer to one
of our hardest, most brutal formats Hogtied has to
offer: the live format.
No cuts, no breaks, all on screen tying and untying.
You see it all - unedited, real BDSM action as it
happened. All the joy and all the agony. The safe
words, the pain, the massive orgasm, and the beauty of
pure spontaneity. Hang on for a fast paced trip into
one of Hogtied's most successful shoots; Real Time
Hogtied at its best.
title: Devaun in her first Hogtied shoot suffers
